name: Testspeed
giudizio2a:
You really thought I wouldn't interject during such an important event as AGDQ?
How cute.\|\.
giudizio3a: The crowd is absurdly adorable today. I would blow a kiss to you all if only I had the animation for it!
giudizio4a: Don't get me wrong. I'll still do what I can to stop you. A slight mistake can still cost you the run.
giudizio5a: Now, let's pretend this never happen and let's return to the game's script-
